automaticGitignore.description: Whether to automatically generate a .gitignore file for this module.

generator.description: The generator the client uses to be generated.

directory.description: The directory the client is generated in.

name.description: The name to use for this dependency. By default, the same as the dependency module's name, but can also be overridden to use a different name.

source.description: The source ref of the module dependency.

pin.description: The pinned version of the module dependency.

engineVersion.description: The version of the engine this module was last updated with.

include.description: Paths to explicitly include from the module, relative to the configuration file.

dependencies.description: The modules this module depends on.

source.description: The path, relative to this config file, to the subdir containing the module's implementation source code.

exclude.description: Paths to explicitly exclude from the module, relative to the configuration file. Deprecated: Use !<pattern> in the include list instead.

clients.description: The clients generated for this module.

disableDefaultFunctionCaching.description: If true, disable the new default function caching behavior for this module. Functions will instead default to the old behavior of per-session caching.

ModuleConfigWithUserFields.description: ModuleConfigWithUserFields is the config for a single module as loaded from a dagger.json file.

experimental.description: The experimental features enabled for this module.

SDK.description: SDK represents the sdk field in dagger.json The source can be reference to a built-in sdk e.g.
